comment._content: From Kate via Twitter: My late grandfather 3rd from left. Think this is 1961at Karimjee Hall

comment.author: 59406631@N05
comment._content: Paul Bomani (3rd from left), Vice President Rashidi Kawawa (4th from left), George Kahama and Amir Jamal.

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The picture shows TANU Elected Members of the Tanganyika Legislative Council and some Ministers who were attending the Tanganyika Constitutional Conference held in the Karimjee Hall, Dar es Salaam from 27 to 29 March 1961. The correct names are, from left, Mr Richard S Wambura, Mr Lawi Sijaona, Mr Paul Bomani, who was then the Minister for Agriculture and Co-operative Development, Mr George Kahama, Minister for Home Affairs, Mr Rashidi Kawawa, Minister for Local Government and Housing, and Mr Amir Jamal, Minister for Communications, Power and Works.
